author: jeffbi
body:
Fix #2856 

Added try/catch within the enumeration loop to allow the enumeration to continue after encountering an error such as an item within the directory being deleted or renamed.

To assist in testing, two new internal test hooks have been added which cause Get-ChildItem to either delete or rename a specific file (file name hard-coded) when encountered during enumeration.

comments.author: jeffbi
comments.body: @iSazonov Thanks for adding the link. I keep thinking that putting it in the title works, but of course it doesn't.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @jeffbi thanks for the thorough thinking on the fix and test. One minor comment and it should be good to go once that's addressed.

title: Make Get-ChildItem continue enumeration when encountering error on contained item (#2856)
